title: Lost connection to my email thats attached to my acc i need help !!
body: so i cant get into my email that is attached to my league account... how do i change the emails now,.................. someone help please :(

replies.body: No worries, we can assist with this!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account team will get back to you and update your info.  See you there!
